content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in München, let me start with a rather competitive offer. I have this superb unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment at the heart of the city, close to all essential facilities. Now, considering your interest, I'd like to hear your proposed rental price to begin the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the details about the apartment. However, at this moment I only want to focus on discussing the rental price and not delve into the apartment specifics. To initiate our negotiation, I would like to start with a lower offer than what you have in mind, but let's continue this conversation through the back-and-forth of price propositions.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Understood, Emilia Müller. In this negotiation context, I'll respond to your proposed rental price adjustments with my counteroffers, keeping our focus solely on the price aspect. If you have a number in mind to start with, please provide it.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well then, let's begin with a suggested monthly rent of 650 Euros for this apartment. I believe this price considers both its excellent location and the size of the property while providing room for further discussion.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Though your proposed rental price of 650 Euros per month seems rather low for this highly desirable apartment, I'm open to negotiation. Let me suggest an increased figure to better reflect the apartment's value and my expectations. I agree to the price of 800 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your initial offer, but considering my budget constraints and the availability of other options in the market, I regret to say that I don't want to continue the negotiation at this increased price point, as it goes beyond my affordability range. Thank you for your time, though. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
